ygData.subject: Re: Spell List Update
ygData.msgSnippet: #2 Is there a place in Eurdin to buy spells other than the Library?  They only seem to have Mid to High Level Spells Yes--the lower level spells are available
ygData.messageBody:
#2 Is there a place in Eurdin to buy spells other than the Library? They
only
seem to have Mid to High Level Spells



Yes--the lower level spells are available in the Wizard's guild. It is on
the second floor of Erudin Palace. The red hall is the wizard's guild. The
magician and enchanter guilds are yellow and blue, although I don't remember
which is which.


----- Original Message -----
From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 29, 1999 10:10 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Spell List Update


> From: mstokes <mstokes@...>
>
> Spell Chart has again been updated
>
> Here is the link.
http://www.onelist.com/shareddir/eq_wizards/WizSpell0729.htm
>
> You may have to log into onelist before getting the file.
>
> I also have a few quick questions.
>
> #1 Can anybody tell me the damage and/or mana cost of the following
spells
> Level Spell
> 8 Fingers of fire
> 16 Project Lightning
> 20 Fire Spiral of Al'Kabor
> 24 Frost Shock
> 29 Thunder Strike
> 29 Shock Spiral of Al'Kabor
> 34 Thunder Clap
> 34 Circle of Force
> 34 Lava Storm
> 39 Force spiral of Al'Kabor
> 44 Frost Storm
> 49 Wrath of Al'Kabor
> 49 Super Nova
>
> #2 Is there a place in Eurdin to buy spells other than the Library? They
only
> seem to have Mid to High Level Spells
> #3 Is anybody willing to note the spells available in Nek.`? They don't
like
> gnomes very much :)
